mapper.select: select expenses_id, identifier, expenses_gmt, matter, amount, handler, ascriptor, expenses_type, department_type, receive_company, ascription, project_num, project_name, class_type, apply_status, remark, gmt_create, gmt_modified from tb_expenses_apply
select payment_id, identifier, verify_id, payment_type, payment_bank, amount, voucher, handler, payment_gmt, remark, gmt_create, gmt_modified from tb_expenses_payment
select verify_id, identifier, text_1, text_2, handler, verify_status, remark, gmt_create, gmt_modified from tb_expenses_verify
